## ThirdwebSDK.getTokenModule() method

Get an instance of a Token module

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTokenModule(address: string): TokenErc20Module;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the deployed module |

<b>Returns:</b>

TokenErc20Module

the module
